headline: Everest Group Positions Broadridge in the Highest Leader Position in Market Impact and as a Star Performer in Wealth Management Products PEAK Matrix速 Assessment 2024
summary: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc. (NYSE:BR), a global Fintech leader, today announces its recognition as the highest-designated Leader in Market Impact and a Star Performer in wealth management for the second year in a row by independent research firm Everest Group in their 2024 Wealth Management Products PEAK Matrix速 Assessment.
